data.title: Who is Kamar de los Reyes? All to know about ‘One Life To Live star’ death at 56
data.meta_description: Kamar de los Reyes was a talented actor renowned for his role as Antonio Vega on the soap opera "One Life to Live." Born in Puerto Rico and raised in Las
data.text:
Kamar de los Reyes was a talented actor renowned for his role as Antonio Vega on the soap opera “One Life to Live.” Born in Puerto Rico and raised in Las Vegas, he pursued his passion for acting in Los Angeles. Kamar’s diverse career included roles in television, film, theater, and video games, making him a beloved figure in entertainment. He passed away at the age of 56 after a brief battle with cancer, leaving behind a legacy of deep personal relationships.

Profile summary

Full Name Kamar de los Reyes Gender Male Date of Birth 8 November 1967 Date of Death 24 December 2022 Age at Death 56 years old Zodiac Sign Scorpio Place of Birth San Juan, Puerto Rico Place of Death Los Angeles, California, USA Nationality American Ethnicity Hispanic Hair Colour Black Eye Colour Brown Famous for Role as Antonio Vega on “One Life to Live” Spouse Sherri Saum Children Caylen (from a previous relationship), Michael and John (twins with Sherri Saum) Parents Matilde and Walfredo de los Reyes Siblings Daniel, Walfredo, Jr., Lily, Ilde Occupation Actor Notable Works “One Life to Live”, “The Rookie”, “All American”, Voice in “Call of Duty”

Who was Kamar de los Reyes?

Kamar, a prominent actor best known for his role as Antonio Vega on the soap opera “One Life to Live,” left a significant mark in the world of entertainment. Born on November 8, 1967, in San Juan, Puerto Rico, Kamar grew up in Las Vegas, where he nurtured his passion for performing. He moved to Los Angeles in the 1980s, driven by his dream of becoming an entertainer.

Acting career and credits

Kamar’s career spanned various mediums including television, film, theater, and video games. He first gained significant attention in 1994 with his role in the off-Broadway play “Blade to the Heat,” where he played Pedro Quinn. His portrayal of Antonio Vega on “One Life to Live” from 1995 to 2009 made him a household name. Besides his work on television, Kamar appeared in notable films like “Nixon” and “Salt,” and voiced the character Raul Menendez in the “Call of Duty” video game franchise.

His more recent work included roles in “Sleepy Hollow,” “The Rookie,” and the CW’s “All American” where he played Coach Montes from 2022 to 2023. At the time of his death, he was actively involved in filming for Hulu’s “Washington Black” and Marvel’s new “Daredevil” series.

How did Kamar impact his colleagues and the industry?

Kamar was deeply respected and loved by his colleagues. Michael Easton, a close friend and fellow actor, recounted how Kamar’s presence was a blend of kindness and professional dedication. He noted that Kamar was a deeply feeling person, kind, genuine, and a treasured friend. Easton highlighted that Kamar’s approach to his cancer diagnosis was a focus on healing rather than sickness, demonstrating immense strength and resolve.

When Did Kamar de los Reyes Pass Away?

The talented actor beloved for his role in “One Life to Live,” passed away on December 24, 2022. He died in Los Angeles after a brief battle with cancer. His passing was mourned by family, friends, and fans who cherished his contributions to the entertainment industry. He was 56 years old at the time of his death.

Who survives Kamar de los Reyes?

Kamar de los Reyes is survived by his wife, actress Sherri Saum, and his sons Caylen, 26, from a previous relationship, and twins Michael and John, aged 9, whom he shared with Saum. He also leaves behind a legacy through his siblings—Daniel, Walfredo, Jr., Lily, and Ilde—and his parents, Matilde and Walfredo.

FAQs

When did Kamar de los Reyes pass away? Kamar de los Reyes passed away on December 24, 2022, in Los Angeles after a brief battle with cancer. He was 56 years old.

What was his most memorable role? Kamar is most remembered for his role as Antonio Vega on “One Life to Live,” which he portrayed from 1995 to 2009.

Did Kamar de los Reyes work on any projects before his death? Yes, Kamar was actively involved in several projects before his passing, including his role as Coach Montes in “All American” and upcoming roles in Hulu’s “Washington Black” and Marvel’s “Daredevil” series.

Who survives Kamar de los Reyes? He is survived by his wife, Sherri Saum, his sons Caylen, Michael, and John, as well as his brothers Daniel and Walfredo, Jr., sisters Lily and Ilde, and parents Matilde and Walfredo.
